comment.author: 37206071@N03
comment._content: Terry Hasse and her bridal party, Oct. 26, 1974, St. Mary's Catholic Church, New Ulm, Minnesota. Her bridesmaids: Penny Hasse (far left), Gwen Hasse (far right), Carmen Hasse Walder (behind the bride), and Diane Steinback (wearing glasses). The flower girl is Kimberly Peterson Quirt and the ring bearer is Keith Pehling. Source: Interview with Terry Hasse, Mar. 7, 2011.

comment.author: 13861582@N03
comment._content: The bride looks like she's about 13!  But then everyone under 30 looks that way to me these days...:-)
